cast.name: 叶卡捷琳娜·马克西莫娃 Ekaterina Maximova
柳德米拉·古尔琴柯 Lyudmila Gurchenko
弗拉基米尔·瓦西里耶夫 Vladimir Vasiliev

introduction: The film tells about Moscow. The city is shown as foreigners see it. The picture consists of several musical numbers, each of which demonstrates one of the city's landmarks or just one of the things that Russians are proud of: the Moscow Metro, the State University, the Luzhniki sports complex, the famous Russian ballet, classical songs and dances and, of course, traditional Russian nesting dolls.0:53 State Krasnoyarsk Dance Ensemble of Siberia5:26 Maria Pakhomenko - The girls are standing (A. Kolker - K. Ryzhov)7:08 Ossetian horse ensemble "Eriston" led by D. Tuganova8:35 Gaya Quartet - Autumn (music and poems by Tofig Babayev, arr. A. Makovsky)11:42 Ekaterina Shavrina - What Was, That Was (G. Ponomarenko - M. Agashina)15:07 Dance group of the Leningrad Music Hall18:15 Muslim Magomayev - Along Piterskaya21:48 Duet Mikhail Rozhkov (balalaika) and Georgy Minyaev (guitar) - Dance with sabers from A. Khachaturian's ballet "Gayane"23:37 Lyudmila Gurchenko - Maria (L. Gurchenko - E. Radov)27:32.
